constituent: increase, soil, dirt, ground, increase, formerly, horns, rice field, brains, sun, day
heisigStory: This kanji depicts an increase of soil, multiplying so fast that it literally buries everything in its path.
koohiiStory1: Prices always INCREASE for LAND that was FORMERLY cheaper.
koohiiStory2: Farmers work the land so they can INCREASE their formerly puny crop supply.
kunYomi: ま.す、ま.し、ふ.える、ふ.やす
myStory: tăng. đất càng cũ càng tăng giá
readingExamples: 増える (ふ.える), 増やす (ふ.やす), 増す (ま.す)
words: to increase, to add to, to augment
extra, additional, less objectionable, better, preferable
